message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $500000 to $800000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still unable to meet your asking price. However, I would like to propose an offer of $800000. I hope this aligns more closely with what you're looking for.
